Package bridge.toolkit.commands

Class Summary
MobileBuilder Builds a HTML, CSS, and JQueryMobile based mobile web app output from the S1000D SCPM and referenced data modules.
PostProcess The last module in the toolkit that applys the SCORM Runtime files and creates the PIF file.
PreProcess The first module in the toolkit that transforms the SCPM into a imsmanifest.xml file and generates a urn_resource_map.xml file from the resource package.
PreProcess41  
SCOBuilder Builds the launchable learning resources (SCOs) from the DMs found in the SCPM.
